name: Voteless
description:
The Voteless are mutated Super Earth citizens, warped by the Illuminate into mindless melee soldiers with pale skin and glowing blue eyes.

While individually weak, they are resilient and lunge quickly, overwhelming Helldivers in large swarms.
Gas weapons and anti-infantry stratagems are highly effective against their hordes.

name: Overseer
description:
Overseers are ancient Illuminate warriors wielding energy staves for both high-damage ranged attacks and devastating melee sweeps.

They deploy energy shields under fire but remain vulnerable to area-of-effect attacks and shots targeting their legs or helmet.
Overseers excel at close combat, using their staves to knock down and overwhelm Helldivers.

name: Elevated Overseer
description:
The Elevated Overseer is a flying medium infantry unit of the Illuminate, equipped with a rapid burst-firing energy weapon and grenades.

With maneuverable flight and frequent dodging, they advance slowly while launching attacks and grenades intermittently.

Elevated Overseers are armored, but their jetpacks and armor plating can be targeted for devastating effects, including instant kills when their jetpacks detonate.

Helldivers can exploit their susceptibility to stunning attacks to immobilize them, strip their armor, and eliminate them effectively.

name: Harvester
description:
Harvesters are large, mechanical tripods armed with a deadly sweeping laser and deployable shields.
Their shields regenerate over time, but destroying the crest above their eye disables them permanently.
Slow and vulnerable to flanking, Harvesters can be taken down with precise shots to their eye or legs.

name: Watcher
description:
Watchers are floating Illuminate scouts that call in reinforcements upon spotting threats, emitting flares to signal Warp Ships.
They fire low-damage Arc lightning when engaged and explode on impact after destruction, posing a final danger to nearby Helldivers.
Precision shots to their main body can eliminate them quickly.

name: Warp Ship
description:
The Warp Ship serves as an Illuminate enemy emplacement and transport aircraft.
Grounded Warp Ships periodically release Voteless and are protected by regenerating shields, requiring explosives or high-demolition stratagems to destroy their bay doors.
Reinforcement Warp Ships lack shields and deploy troops via tractor beams but can be destroyed with precision strikes from rockets or heavy weapons.
